blogs.description: A Black employee has filed a racial discrimination suit against Tesla, saying a manager would greet employees by saying, “Welcome to the slave house,” the San Jose Mercury News reports. According to Raina Pierce's complaint, “Tesla’s facilities contain the N-…
blogs.body:
Twitter posted quarterly earnings of $513 million days after it agreed to be sold to billionaire Elon Musk.
The social media company said Thursday that revenue rose 16% to $1.2 billion in the three … [+2243 chars]
